TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CustomAttributeData extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供对加载到仅反射上下文的程序集、模块、类型、成员和参数的自定义属性数据的访问权限。

span.span: Provides access to custom attribute data for assemblies, modules, types, members and parameters that are loaded into the reflection-only context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无法执行在仅反射上下文中检查的代码，因此，不一定总是可以通过创建自定义属性的实例，然后使用 、等方法来检查它们的属性，来检查自定义属性。Code that is being examined in the reflection-only context cannot be executed, so it is not always possible to examine custom attributes by creating instances of them and then examining their properties, using methods like , , and so on. 如果属性类型本身的代码加载到仅反射上下文中，则无法执行该代码。If the code for the attribute type itself is loaded into the reflection-only context, it cannot be executed. 利用 类，可以通过提供特性的抽象来检查仅反射上下文中的自定义特性。The class allows examination of custom attributes in the reflection-only context by providing an abstraction for attributes. 此类的成员可用于获取特性的位置参数和命名参数。The members of this class can be used to obtain the positional arguments and named arguments of the attribute. 使用 属性可获取表示位置参数的 结构列表，并使用 属性获取表示命名参数的 结构的列表。Use the property to get a list of structures that represent the positional arguments, and use the property to get a list of structures that represent the named arguments. > [!NOTE] > 结构仅提供有关用于获取和设置参数值的特性属性的信息。The structure only provides information about the attribute property used to get and set the argument value. 若要获取参数的类型和值，请使用 属性获取 结构。To obtain the type and value of the argument, use the property to obtain a structure. 如果有参数的 结构，无论是命名名称还是位置，请使用 属性获取类型，并使用 属性来获取值。When you have a structure for an argument, whether named or positional, use the property to get the type and the property to get the value. > [!NOTE] > 对于数组参数， 属性返回 对象的泛型 。For an array argument, the property returns a generic of objects. 集合中的每个 对象都表示数组的对应元素。Each object in the collection represents the corresponding element of the array. 可用于执行上下文以及仅反射上下文中。 can be used in the execution context as well as in the reflection-only context. 例如，你可能希望避免加载包含自定义特性的代码的程序集。For example, you might want to avoid loading the assembly that contains the code for a custom attribute. 使用 类不同于使用 方法：Using the class is different from using methods like : - 的属性和方法仅提供为属性实例指定的值，而不提供构造函数的语义。The properties and methods of only provide you with the values that were specified for the attribute instance, not the semantics of the constructor. 例如，特性的字符串自变量可能在内部转换为某种其他表示形式，并以规范形式返回;或属性在执行实际属性代码时可能会有副作用。For example, a string argument of an attribute might be converted internally to some other representation, and returned in a canonical form; or a property might have side effects when the actual attribute code is executed. - 的属性和方法不允许检索从基类继承的自定义属性。The properties and methods of do not allow you to retrieve the custom attributes inherited from base classes. 若要创建 类的实例，请使用 `static` （Visual Basic 中的`Shared`） 工厂方法。To create instances of the class, use the `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) factory methods. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个具有四个构造函数和四个属性的自定义特性。The following example defines a custom attribute with four constructors and four properties. 两个属性是只读的，并且是通过使用构造函数的位置参数设置的。Two of the properties are read-only, and are set by using the positional parameters of the constructors. 其他两个属性是可读/写的，只能通过使用命名参数来设置。The other two properties are read/write, and can be set only by using named arguments. 一个位置属性是字符串数组，一个命名的属性是一个整数数组。One positional property is an array of strings, and one named property is an array of integers. 该特性可应用于程序集、在该程序集中声明的类型、该类型的方法以及该方法的参数。The attribute is applied to the assembly, to a type declared in the assembly, to a method of the type, and to a parameter of the method. 在这些情况下使用不同的构造函数。Different constructors are used for these cases. 当执行时，该程序集会将其自身加载到仅反射上下文中，并显示有关已应用于该属性的自定义特性的信息以及它所包含的类型和成员的信息。When executed, the assembly loads itself into the reflection-only context and displays information about the custom attributes that were applied to it and to the type and members it contains. 应用于该类型的特性演示数组属性，同时包含位置参数和命名参数。The attribute that is applied to the type demonstrates array properties, with both positional and named arguments. [!code-cpp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数由派生类在构造 对象的过程中调用。This constructor is invoked by derived classes during the construction of objects.

permission.span: 需要对直接调用方的完全信任。

span.span: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 部分受信任的或透明的代码不能使用此成员。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

summary.span: 获取一个 对象，表示应已初始化自定义属性的构造函数。

span.span: Gets a object that represents the constructor that would have initialized the custom attribute.

value.span: 一个对象，表示应已初始化由 类的当前实例表示的自定义属性的构造函数。

span.span: An object that represents the constructor that would have initialized the custom attribute represented by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果特性类型具有多个构造函数，则此属性将仅返回特定构造函数，该构造函数将初始化当前 对象所表示的特性实例。If an attribute type has multiple constructors, this property returns only the particular constructor that would have initialized the attribute instance represented by the current object. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个具有四个构造函数和四个属性的自定义特性。The following example defines a custom attribute with four constructors and four properties. 两个属性是只读的，并且是通过使用构造函数的位置参数设置的。Two of the properties are read-only, and are set by using the positional parameters of the constructors. 其他两个属性是可读/写的，只能通过使用命名参数来设置。The other two properties are read/write, and can be set only by using named arguments. 一个位置属性是字符串数组，一个命名的属性是一个整数数组。One positional property is an array of strings, and one named property is an array of integers. 该特性可应用于程序集、在该程序集中声明的类型、该类型的方法以及该方法的参数。The attribute is applied to the assembly, to a type declared in the assembly, to a method of the type, and to a parameter of the method. 在这些情况下使用不同的构造函数。Different constructors are used for these cases. 执行时，该程序集会将其自身加载到仅反射上下文中，并显示自定义属性。When executed, the assembly loads itself into the reflection-only context and displays the custom attributes. 应用于该类型的特性演示数组属性，同时包含位置参数和命名参数。The attribute that is applied to the type demonstrates array properties, with both positional and named arguments. 属性用于显示自定义属性数据的 `ShowAttributeData` 方法。The property is used in the `ShowAttributeData` method that displays custom attribute data. 在此代码示例中，此属性返回的 用于显示描述构造函数的文本字符串，演示属性返回将初始化特性的构造函数。In this code example, the returned by this property is used to display a text string that describes the constructor, demonstrating that the property returns the constructor that would initialize the attribute. [!code-cpp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/VB/source.vb#1)]

Public ReadOnly Property ConstructorArguments As IList(Of CustomAttributeTypedArgument)

summary.span: 获取为由 对象表示的特性实例指定的位置参数列表。

span.span: Gets the list of positional arguments specified for the attribute instance represented by the object.

value.span: 一个结构的集合，表示为自定义特性实例指定的位置参数。

span.span: A collection of structures that represent the positional arguments specified for the custom attribute instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法获取为自定义特性实例指定的位置自变量，而不执行任何自定义属性代码。This method gets the positional arguments that were specified for the custom attribute instance without executing any of the custom attribute code. 因此，它可以在仅反射上下文中使用。Thus, it can be used in the reflection-only context. 使用 方法可获取为特性实例指定的命名参数。Use the method to get the named arguments specified for the attribute instance. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个具有四个构造函数和四个属性的自定义特性。The following example defines a custom attribute with four constructors and four properties. 两个属性是只读的，并且是通过使用构造函数的位置参数设置的。Two of the properties are read-only, and are set by using the positional parameters of the constructors. 其他两个属性是可读/写的，只能通过使用命名参数来设置。The other two properties are read/write, and can be set only by using named arguments. 一个位置属性是字符串数组，一个命名的属性是一个整数数组。One positional property is an array of strings, and one named property is an array of integers. 该特性可应用于程序集、在该程序集中声明的类型、该类型的方法以及该方法的参数。The attribute is applied to the assembly, to a type declared in the assembly, to a method of the type, and to a parameter of the method. 在这些情况下使用不同的构造函数。Different constructors are used for these cases. 执行时，该程序集会将其自身加载到仅反射上下文中，并显示自定义属性。When executed, the assembly loads itself into the reflection-only context and displays the custom attributes. 应用于该类型的特性演示数组属性，同时包含位置参数和命名参数。The attribute that is applied to the type demonstrates array properties, with both positional and named arguments. 属性用于显示自定义属性数据的 `ShowAttributeData` 方法。The property is used in the `ShowAttributeData` method that displays custom attribute data. 在此代码示例中，此属性用于显示传递到初始化属性的构造函数的参数列表。In this code example, this property is used to display the list of arguments passed to the constructor that initialized the attribute. [!code-cpp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class System.Reflection.CustomAttributeData> GetCustomAttributes(class System.Reflection.Assembly target) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetCustomAttributes (target As Assembly) As IList(Of CustomAttributeData)

param.name: target
param.span: 要检索其自定义特性数据的程序集。

span.span: The assembly whose custom attribute data is to be retrieved.

summary.span: 返回 对象列表，这些对象表示已应用到目标程序集的特性相关数据。

span.span: Returns a list of objects representing data about the attributes that have been applied to the target assembly.

returns.span: 对象的列表，表示已应用到目标程序集的特性相关数据。

span.span: A list of objects that represent data about the attributes that have been applied to the target assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法提供了可始终在仅反射上下文中使用的 方法的替代方法。This method provides an alternative to the method that can always be used in the Reflection-only context. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个具有四个构造函数和四个属性的自定义特性。The following example defines a custom attribute with four constructors and four properties. 两个属性是只读的，并且是通过使用构造函数的位置参数设置的。Two of the properties are read-only, and are set by using the positional parameters of the constructors. 其他两个属性是可读/写的，只能通过使用命名参数来设置。The other two properties are read/write, and can be set only by using named arguments. 一个位置属性是字符串数组，一个命名的属性是一个整数数组。One positional property is an array of strings, and one named property is an array of integers. 该特性可应用于程序集、在该程序集中声明的类型、该类型的方法以及该方法的参数。The attribute is applied to the assembly, to a type declared in the assembly, to a method of the type, and to a parameter of the method. 在这些情况下使用不同的构造函数。Different constructors are used for these cases. 执行时，该程序集会将其自身加载到仅反射上下文中，并显示自定义属性。When executed, the assembly loads itself into the reflection-only context and displays the custom attributes. 应用于该类型的特性演示数组属性，同时包含位置参数和命名参数。The attribute that is applied to the type demonstrates array properties, with both positional and named arguments. 方法在 `Main()` 中用于获取应用于程序集的自定义特性。The method is used in `Main()` to get the custom attributes applied to the assembly. 方法的返回值将传递给 `ShowAttributeData` 方法。The return value of the method is passed to the `ShowAttributeData` method. [!code-cpp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: A list of objects that represent data about the attributes that have been applied to the target member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重载获取类型、嵌套类型和类型成员的自定义特性数据，因为 类和表示类型成员的 命名空间中的类均派生自 。This method overload gets custom attribute data for types, nested types, and type members, because the class and the classes in the namespace that represent type members all derive from . ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个具有四个构造函数和四个属性的自定义特性。The following example defines a custom attribute with four constructors and four properties. 两个属性是只读的，并且是通过使用构造函数的位置参数设置的。Two of the properties are read-only, and are set by using the positional parameters of the constructors. 其他两个属性是可读/写的，只能通过使用命名参数来设置。The other two properties are read/write, and can be set only by using named arguments. 一个位置属性是字符串数组，一个命名的属性是一个整数数组。One positional property is an array of strings, and one named property is an array of integers. 该特性可应用于程序集、在该程序集中声明的类型、该类型的方法以及该方法的参数。The attribute is applied to the assembly, to a type declared in the assembly, to a method of the type, and to a parameter of the method. 在这些情况下使用不同的构造函数。Different constructors are used for these cases. 执行时，该程序集会将其自身加载到仅反射上下文中，并显示自定义属性。When executed, the assembly loads itself into the reflection-only context and displays the custom attributes. 应用于该类型的特性演示数组属性，同时包含位置参数和命名参数。The attribute that is applied to the type demonstrates array properties, with both positional and named arguments. `Main()` 中使用 方法来获取应用于类型和测试方法（ 派生自 ）的自定义特性。The method is used in `Main()` to get the custom attributes that were applied to a type and to a test method ( derives from ). 的返回值将传递给 `ShowAttributeData` 方法。The return value of is passed to the `ShowAttributeData` method. [!code-cpp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/VB/source.vb#1)]

value.span: 一个结构的集合，表示为自定义特性实例指定的命名参数。

span.span: A collection of structures that represent the named arguments specified for the custom attribute instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法获取为自定义特性实例指定的命名参数，而无需执行任何自定义属性代码。This method gets the named arguments that were specified for the custom attribute instance without executing any of the custom attribute code. 因此，它可以在仅反射上下文中使用。Thus, it can be used in the Reflection-only context. 返回的列表仅包含为特性实例指定的命名参数。The list that is returned contains only the named arguments that were specified for the attribute instance. 使用 方法可获取为特性实例指定的位置参数。Use the method to get the positional arguments that were specified for the attribute instance. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个具有四个构造函数和四个属性的自定义特性。The following example defines a custom attribute with four constructors and four properties. 两个属性是只读的，并且是通过使用构造函数的位置参数设置的。Two of the properties are read-only, and are set by using the positional parameters of the constructors. 其他两个属性是可读/写的，只能通过使用命名参数来设置。The other two properties are read/write, and can be set only by using named arguments. 一个位置属性是字符串数组，一个命名的属性是一个整数数组。One positional property is an array of strings, and one named property is an array of integers. 该特性可应用于程序集、在该程序集中声明的类型、该类型的方法以及该方法的参数。The attribute is applied to the assembly, to a type declared in the assembly, to a method of the type, and to a parameter of the method. 在这些情况下使用不同的构造函数。Different constructors are used for these cases. 执行时，该程序集会将其自身加载到仅反射上下文中，并显示自定义属性。When executed, the assembly loads itself into the reflection-only context and displays the custom attributes. 应用于该类型的特性演示数组属性，同时包含位置参数和命名参数。The attribute that is applied to the type demonstrates array properties, with both positional and named arguments. 属性用于显示自定义属性数据的 `ShowAttributeData` 方法。The property is used in the `ShowAttributeData` method that displays custom attribute data. 在此代码示例中，此属性用于显示为特性指定的命名参数的列表。In this code example, this property is used to display the list of named arguments specified for the attribute. [!code-cpp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: 返回自定义特性的字符串表示形式。

span.span: Returns a string representation of the custom attribute.

returns.span: 一个表示自定义特性的字符串值。

span.span: A string value that represents the custom attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该字符串值包括属性类型、属性参数和命名参数。The string value includes the attribute type, the attribute parameters, and the named parameters. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个具有四个构造函数和四个属性的自定义特性。The following example defines a custom attribute with four constructors and four properties. 两个属性是只读的，并且是通过使用构造函数的位置参数设置的。Two of the properties are read-only, and are set by using the positional parameters of the constructors. 其他两个属性是可读/写的，只能通过使用命名参数来设置。The other two properties are read/write, and can be set only by using named arguments. 一个位置属性是字符串数组，一个命名的属性是一个整数数组。One positional property is an array of strings, and one named property is an array of integers. 该特性可应用于程序集、在该程序集中声明的类型、该类型的方法以及该方法的参数。The attribute is applied to the assembly, to a type declared in the assembly, to a method of the type, and to a parameter of the method. 在这些情况下使用不同的构造函数。Different constructors are used for these cases. 执行时，该程序集会将其自身加载到仅反射上下文中，并显示自定义属性。When executed, the assembly loads itself into the reflection-only context and displays the custom attributes. 应用于该类型的特性演示数组属性，同时包含位置参数和命名参数。The attribute that is applied to the type demonstrates array properties, with both positional and named arguments. 在此示例中， 方法用在 `ShowAttributeData` 方法中，用于标识正在显示其数据的属性。In this example, the method is used in the `ShowAttributeData` method, to identify the attribute whose data is being displayed. [!code-cpp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/VB/source.vb#1)]
